about.title: About Me
about.summary: Core developer at Sheba Platform Limited contributing to award-winning FinTech products. Specialized in building scalable backend systems and microservice architectures that serve thousands of users daily.
highlights: Core developer of Sheba Pay - FinTech Start-Up of the Year 2025
Backend developer for award-recognized PSP Passthrough module
Published research on automated application testing using deep learning
Full-cycle development across payment systems, microservices & cloud infrastructure

positions.description: Core developer of Sheba Pay, the platform that won 'FinTech Start-Up of the Year 2025' at the 3rd Bangladesh Fintech Awards, contributing to major product features across the system.
highlights: Core developer of Sheba Pay, the platform that won 'FinTech Start-Up of the Year 2025' at the 3rd Bangladesh Fintech Awards
Backend developer for the award-recognized PSP Passthrough module with Honorable Mention for 'FinTech Innovation of the Year (NBFI)'
Delivered full-cycle development across frontend and backend, including API integrations and business logic
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance platform performance, reliability, and user experience

positions.description: Contributed to both frontend and backend development, successfully transforming a Java-based system into a Deno-powered web application.
highlights: Transformed a Java-based system into a modern Deno-powered web application
Deployed and maintained the project on Supabase, ensuring reliability and scalability
Addressed post-delivery issues and implemented client-requested changes leading to successful project completion

positions.description: Worked on in-house projects including employee attendance and invoice generation systems.
highlights: Created Employee attendance with invoice generation system
Designed database and APIs from scratch with no documentation

projects.name: TimeForge
projects.description: Comprehensive event and meeting management platform with Google Calendar integration and secure meeting hosting.
projects.problem: Difficulty in managing multiple event types and hosting secure meetings with controlled attendee access
projects.solution: Built a feature-rich platform with Google Calendar API integration, Stripe payments, and admin panel for seamless event management
features: Create and manage multiple types of events
Host meetings with only allowed attendees
Feature-rich Admin panel for CRUD operations
Google Calendar integration for multi-platform support
projects.myRole: Team Leader - Integrated Google Calendar API, implemented meeting hosting feature, distributed tasks among teammates

projects.name: Neat-Site
projects.description: An Uber-like platform for salon services, connecting clients with salons for easy appointment booking and management.
projects.problem: Clients struggle to find and book salon appointments, salon owners need better appointment management
projects.solution: Created a two-sided platform where clients can search and book appointments while salon owners manage their services and schedules
features: Search and book appointments with any salon
Salon owner dashboard for managing appointments and services
Real-time availability checking
Service catalog management
projects.myRole: Backend Developer - Designed and managed the database, created all necessary APIs

projects.name: EduSphere
projects.description: RESTful API for educational platform with complete CRUD operations, email functionality, and comprehensive API documentation.
projects.problem: Need for a robust, well-documented backend API for educational applications
projects.solution: Developed a fully documented API with Swagger UI, email integration via Resend, and validation using Zod
features: Complete CRUD operations for all entities
Email notifications using Resend
Interactive API documentation with Swagger UI
Schema validation with Zod

projects.name: Fake Wallet
projects.description: A simulated cryptocurrency wallet interface for learning and demonstration purposes.
projects.problem: Need for a safe environment to understand cryptocurrency wallet interfaces without real assets
projects.solution: Built a demo wallet application that simulates real wallet functionality for educational purposes
features: Simulated wallet interface
Transaction history tracking
Portfolio visualization
User-friendly dashboard

projects.name: AssetTrackr
projects.description: Asset tracking system for managing company devices and employee assignments.
projects.problem: Companies need efficient ways to track devices assigned to employees
projects.solution: Created a simple CRUD application to manage device inventory and employee assignments
features: Insert company device and employee information
Track company device assignments
Simple CRUD operations on data

projects.name: ShiftCare
projects.description: Modern admin portal for managing staff members and their booking schedules with calendar views and conflict detection.
projects.problem: Staff scheduling systems need efficient booking management, conflict prevention, and recurring schedule support
projects.solution: Built a comprehensive admin portal with calendar views, RRule generator for recurring bookings, and automatic conflict detection
features: Staff and carer management with profile images
Booking scheduler with one-time and recurring shifts
Monthly calendar view with color-coded shifts
Automatic conflict detection and prevention
RRule generator for complex recurrence patterns
Real-time pricing calculation and special instructions
